long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whether you want to speed up a lecture or slow down a tutorial, "Video Duration for YouTube‚Ñ¢" gives you full control over your video viewing experience. With this extension, you can easily try out different speeds and see how much time you could save or add based on your selection.

Also, the remaining video length is shown so you can plan your viewing time more efficiently.

‚ö°Ô∏è Features ‚ö°Ô∏è
- Adjust video playback speed beyond 2x 
- Jump to 1x speed, and jump back to the previous speed in one click  
- Find out how much time will be saved or added comparing to watching in 1x speed
- Know how long it takes to watch the rest of the video at current speed
- Know your YouTube Shorts: know video length, change video speed, skip through video
- Continue using your favorite shortcuts already provided by YouTube
- Tailor the extension to your liking with settings

üí• Keyboard shortcuts üí•
Works with any keyboard layouts. Here are the QWERTY shortcuts for reference:
Change speed: A / D
Jump to x1 speed: S
Restart video: R
Rewind / advance 10 seconds: J / L
Play / pause: K
Mute / unmute: M 
Show / hide controller: V
